quest.name: Shadowed Remnants
journal: Varshahn wears a look of quiet determination.
objectives: Gather information on the hydromantic terraces.
Search for the clever voidsent at carcere IV.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Wherever I turn, there's Darkness as far as I can perceive; the only source of Light here is ourselves. The opposite was true in the First.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: It seems the minions are content to gawp for now. Let's carry on.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: The warding scale exhibits no change. It should be safe to remain here and begin our search.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: But whither now? I would sense Azdaja were she remotely near, but there is nothing...

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Might you not call to her? Let her know that you have come.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: Alas, this vessel is not capable of calling across vast distances. For that, I require my true form.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: And even were it possible, a dragon's call is borne upon aether. 'Tis liable to draw more voidsent to us.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: I see...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: In any case, there's little exploration to be done while we are confined to this isolated isle.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I propose we begin by learning what we can from the castle's occupants. An understanding of their ways may prove useful to our cause.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Very well. Let's hope a few of them are capable of speech.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: Let all remain vigilant while we go about our inquiries. We reconvene afterwards.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Like the prevailing tongue in Norvrandt, the language of this world bears a resemblance to our own. It may be assumed that they share a common ancestor.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: This one does naught but stare...

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: Some seem willing enough to converse. Whether they have the ability to do so is another matter...

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04593A
dialogue.text: Grrrrrr...

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04593A
dialogue.text: Grrr? Grrraaargggh...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The creature snarls and glares at you. It is unlikely that you will learn anything from it.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04593A
dialogue.text: Grrr... Grrraaargggh!

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04593B
dialogue.text: What enticing aether you have... Give me some! Give me some!

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04593B
dialogue.text: Awww... If only I were stronger, I'd be able to eat you...

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04593B
dialogue.text: Fine, fine. I'll find someone else to eat... <grumble>

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: While able to communicate, this one seems to think only of feeding. Better to take your inquiries elsewhere.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04593B
dialogue.text: I want to eat you. I mustn't eat you. I want to eat you. I mustn't eat you...

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04593C
dialogue.text: The mistress's eyes are beauteous! Sublime! To bask in her gaze is bliss!

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04593C
dialogue.text: But now she's gone... Never again will I feel her gaze...

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04593C
dialogue.text: No mistress. No orders. What am I to do now? What am I to do now?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The creature mutters endlessly to itself, not sparing you so much as a glance.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04593C
dialogue.text: No mistress. No orders. What am I to do now? What am I to do now?

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04593D
dialogue.text: I serve! I obey! Please don't eat me!

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04593D
dialogue.text: A...dragon? What's that? Does it taste good? I don't know anything about it. Don't know about anything.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04593D
dialogue.text: But the one we caught recently, they seemed to know lots.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04593D
dialogue.text: We threw them in the dungeon, but clever ones are tasty. They might have been eaten already.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You've learned all you can from this voidsent. If you look in the dungeon, you may be able to find the clever one it mentioned.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04593D
dialogue.text: We threw the clever one in the dungeon, but clever ones are tasty. If I had the chance, I don't think I could resist...

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: I have nothing to share. While those I approached had no will to fight, neither were they capable of holding a conversation worth the name.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: My experience was much the same. Lower-rung voidsent tend to have lower intelligence, 'twould seem.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: A pity Scarmiglione is dead. He was talkative at least.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: What of you?

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: A clever voidsent in the dungeon...

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: That would be the area in which we emerged.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Indeed.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Let's take ourselves back there and find this voidsent─preferably before its fellows make a meal of it.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: To the dungeon, then.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: There appears to be someone within...

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: I mislike the feel of this. Stay on your guard.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: Could this be the clever voidsent?

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Zenos's avatar, eh? What are the odds.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: We still know little about her, but for now I'm glad we found someone who can do more than moan for aether.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: I assume the dungeon was reserved for those intended for the mistress's consumption.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: 'Tis fortunate that we came here when we did. Fateful, even.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: When I served Zenos, my mind was shrouded in haze. But one thing was always clear─his obsession with the “friend.”

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: What the word means, I do not know exactly. I know only that it referred to you, and that yours was an important existence.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: As much as one might expect the unexpected, I doubt any of us could have foreseen this turn of events.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: She seems different from other voidsent─at least those we've met. And the change we witnessed, I suspect, is due to your crystal purging the excess Darkness in her.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Even so, she still harbors a great deal of Darkness. I'm very keen to hear what she can tell us─about herself and about her world.
